title: Can you name a song that mention 'me' in the title or lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take On Me by A-ha Me, Myself and I by De La Soul Call Me by Chris Montez / Blondie (different songs) Do You Love Me (by the Contours / the Dave Clark Five) Don’t You Want Me (by the Human Fascination) You Shook Me All Night Long (by AC/DC) Let Me Be (by the Turtles) Don’t Bring Me Down (by the Electric Light Orchestra) Come Go With Me (by the Dell-Vikings) You Keep Me Hanging On (by the Supremes / Vanilla Fudge) Don’t Let The Sun Go Down on Me (by Elton John) Turn Me Loose (by Loverboy) Start Me Up (by the Rolling Stones) You Showed Me (by the Turtles) Touch Me (by the Doors) You Don’t Have to Say you Love Me (by Dusty Springfield / Elvis Presley) You Don’t Own Me (by Lesley Gore / the Blow Monkeys) Love Me Tender (by Elvis Presley) Help Me Rhonda (by the Beach Boys) You Spin Me ’Round - Like a Record (by Dead or Alive) You Tell Me Why (by the Beau Brummels) It Ain’t Me Babe (by the Turtles, third mention by the Turtles) I Want You to want Me (by Cheap Trick) It’s All Coming Back to Me Now (by Celine Dion) She’d Rather Be With Me (by the Turtles - again) Please, Please Me (by the Beatles) If You Leave Me Now (by Cheap Trick) Me and You and a Dog named Boo (by Lobo) *only song here not on my music device* Just Like Me (by Paul Revere and the Raiders) Working My Way Back to You/Forgive Me Girl (by the Spinners) Kiss Me I’m Shitfaced (by the Dropkick Murphys) Him or Me What’s It Gonna Be (by Paul Revere and the Raiders) Killing Me Softly with his Song (by Roberta Flack / the Fugees) Don’t You - Forget about Me (by the Simple Minds) Touch-A, Touch-A, Touch Me (by Susan Sarandon from the Rocky Horror Picture Show soundtrack) Don’t Let Me Be Misunderstood (by the Animals / Santa Esmeralda) They’re Coming to take me Away (by Napoleon XIV) (another song not on my device) Something Tells Me I’m Into Something Good (by Herman’s Hermits) Something happened to me yesterday (by the Rolling Stones) She Don’t Know Me (by the Grass Roots) Forgive Me (by Evanescence) Please Forgive Me (by Bryan Adams) Hold Me Thrill Me Kiss Me (by Mel Carter) Wow, all these “me” songs are making me think of Carly Simon’s top hit, You’re So Vain. Next question is “you.”

ME!- Taylor Swift feat. Brendan Urie (obvious one) I Me Mine- The Beatles Don’t Worry About Me- Frances From Me To You- The Beatles Tell Me Why- The Beatles Tell Me Why- Taylor Swift Bring Me Home- Jamie McDell Look What You Made Me Do- Taylor Swift No One’s Gonna See Me Cry- Wendy Morris Ask Me Why- The Beatles Chase Me- Katie Melua Don’t Blame Me- Taylor Swift It’s Alright With Me- Humbear Love Me Do- The Beatles Call Me Maybe- Carly Rae Jepson this is me trying- Taylor Swift

Break me shake me-Savage Garden The lover after me-Savage Garden Hold me-Savage Garden Crush (1980 me)-Darren Hayes Amame-Juanes (Love me in Spanish) Look what you made me do-Taylor Swift You belong with me-Taylor Swift Me!-Taylor Swift Love me like you do-Ellie Goulding Fall on me-Andrea Bocelli/Matteo Bocelli Turn me on-Kevin Lyttle The woman in me-Shania Twain That don’t impress me much-Shania Twain You never even called me by my name-David Allen Coe Call me maybe-Carly Rae Jepsen Count on me-Bruno Mars

It's Probably Me by Eric Clapton & Sting(Let Me Be Your) Teddy Bear by Elvis PresleyDon't Let the Sun Go Down on Me by Elton John & George MichaelLet Me Blow Ya Mind by Eve & Gwen StefaniDon't Let Me Down by Leona Lewis & Justin TimberlakeLet You Love Me by Rita OraNever Let Me Down Again - Live by Depeche ModeDon't Let Me Be Misunderstood by The AnimalsLet It Be Me - Live by The Everly BrothersAnd a special rendition of The Beatles’ ‘Don’t Let Me Down’

Evelyn Evelyn - “You Only Want Me ’Cause You Want My Sister”Ashlee Simpson - “Pieces Of Me”Marilyn Manson - “Eat Me Drink Me”Type O Negative - “I Don’t Wanna Be Me”Hole - “He Hit Me (And It Felt Like A Kiss)”Ludo - “Love Me Dead”Falling In Reverse - “The Drug In Me Is You”3OH3 - “Don’t Trust Me”Mindless Self Indulgence - “Shut Me Up”Korn - “Falling Away From Me”

When She Loved Me from Toy Story 2 That Don’t Impress Me Much by Shania Twain Help Me Rhonda by The Beach Boys As Long As You Love Me by the Backstreet Boys Show Me the Meaning of Being Lonely by the Backstreet Boys Leave It Up To Me by Aaron Carter It’s Gonna Be Me by *NSYNC So Help Me Girl by Joe Diffie(RIP…) When You Look Me In the Eyes- Jonas Brothers

I've heard that some of the Beatles early songs like Love Me Do, Please Please Me, From Me To You, were intentionally written to make the listeners/buyers of their records feel a personal connection to them….and the rest is history…✌

Sir, Here are a few personal favorites; “Everly Brothers” - Let It Be Me ( The Everly Brothers - LET IT BE ME & (The late) Phil Everly ~ sings ~ Let it Be Me ~ ) “Nilsson” - Me And My Arrow ( Me and my Arrow-Harry Nilsson Lyrics ) “The Jeff Beck Group” - Let Me Love You ( Jeff Beck Group - Let Me Love You )
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Kartik Kumar(कार्तिक कुमार)

response.answer_text: “Me and Mrs. Jones” by Billy Paul from the fall of 1972. It was his only big hit record (#1 for three weeks), a Grammy for his vocal and a story line made for video.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Kartik Kumar(कार्तिक कुमार)

response.answer_text: “I’m In You” by Peter Frampton from the summer of 1977. “I’m In you, you're in me, You gave me the love, the love that I never had”. Source: Wikipedia
